preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: This documentation module covers content about the &COMPANYABBR; Portal. It is not currently intended as a standalone document.

chapter.title: Using the &COMPANYABBR; Portal
chapter.para: The Portal is the common entry point for all &COMPANYABBR; web applications.
Future revisions of this document will include helpful instructions for locating the Portal, signing in to the &COMPANYABBR;, and accessing &COMPANYABBR; web applications.
